ai.summary: A short, easy 1 km hike along the Illogan FP 10 footpath in the UK. Suitable for beginners and families, featuring a gentle, mostly flat route with minimal ascent.
ai.terrain_summary: Gentle, well-maintained footpath with mostly flat terrain. May include grassy or compacted earth surfaces, and occasional mud after rain. Watch for uneven sections near hedges or roadside edges.
ai.safety_notes: Before you go, check local conditions and forecast. Wear sturdy footwear and appropriate clothing. Stay on the designated footpath and keep children and pets under supervision. Be mindful of other walkers and occasional road sections; during wet conditions the path can be slippery. Carry a map or offline navigation and ensure your phone is charged for emergencies.
recommended_gear: Map or fully charged smartphone with offline navigation
ai.best_seasons: All year, with the most pleasant conditions typically from late spring to early autumn.

seo.title: Illogan FP 10 – 1 km Easy UK Footpath Hike
seo.meta_description: Explore Illogan FP 10, a 1 km easy hike in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, recommended gear, and the best seasons for this short footpath walk.
